long_description: A good pair of hiking shorts is a must, and you can't go wrong with the women's soft, stretchy adidas Hike Shorts. Lightweight nylon ClimaLite(R) fabric has spandex added for comfortable stretch. Wicks moisture off your skin to the outer fabric layer for quick evaporation. Women's adidas Hike Shorts have hand pockets and a zippered security pocket on the thigh. Overstock.
short_description: A good pair of hiking shorts is a must, and you can't go wrong with the women's soft, stretchy adidas Hike Shorts.
